homePage.title: I PROVIDE FULL-CYCLE DEVELOPMENT SERVICE:
homePage.titleDescription: I have extensive experience in creating and developing a brand, but my love of technology has led me to web development. I worked with various enterprises and startups in Russia, Ukraine, Great Britain, and Argentina, offering all kinds of methods for developing their product. Such as supporting ready-made applications for creating a project from scratch and migrating to another technology stack.

skills.frontFrame: Solid understanding of the Javascript such us React, Redux, Redux saga, Gatsby/Next.js, Vue, Nuxt.js, Vuex.
skills.frontLang: ES6, CoffeeScript, TypeScript. I have working knowledge on different javascript versions and supersets
skills.htmlLang: Solid understanding of HTML/HTML5 and CSS including Pre-processors like Less, Sass, Compass, Stylus.
skills.engines: Template engines, Test engines, Browser Automation Tools
skills.enginesTemplate: Since the time I became a frontend developer I've received the experience in lots of template engines like Pug, Jade, Slim, Haml, Jinja2, Twig.
skills.enginesTest: I have working knowledge of test engines like Mocha.js, Chai.js, Jest, Jasmine
skills.enginesOpti: I used Sellenium for a recent project for a year. My responsibility was to automate user registration and interaction on several. Famous site reviews. I also have experience optimizing the position in a search using Google and Yandex tools.
skills.backDescription: Work with node.js development on the project the introduction of new,support and development of the current functionality. I worked with several php frameworks like Yii2, Symfony. Use and understand object oriented programming. Working with Python Familiar with the Django Framework There is experience with the RabbitMQ message broker. Developed an API (REST).
skills.backData: I am acquainted with MySQL, MongoDB and their frameworks like Mongoose, etc.
skills.relatedRun: Good knowledge of different task runners.
skills.relatedOnline: Experienced in helpful online services for the web development.
skills.relatedOs: I can develop shell scripts for different operating systems. Since the time I started using Linux and iOS I've always used shell scripts to simplify my work.
skills.relatedVer: I have experience with many version control systems.
skills.personalProblemDescription: I have excelent problem-solving skills and I am not afraid of hard tasks. Hard tasks motivate me, especially when I need to learn something new to complete the task.
skills.personalSelfDescription: As far as I have been working as a remote developer for a long time, I learned how to discipline and motivate myself.
skills.communicationDescription: I am a very sociable person during my job and I'm not afraid to ask for a help and never refuse to help my colleagues.

contact.getDescription: You can contact me for any information you are interested in. To do this, fill out the feedback form or use the contact information provided by me. And I will answer you as soon as possible.
